mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.book_id AS "book.id", gbk.name AS "book.name", a.section_id AS "section.id", prs.name AS "section.name", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.criteria AS "criteria", a.criteria_desc AS "criteriaDesc", a.script AS "script", a.script_desc AS "scriptDesc", a.priority AS "priority", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diy_guide_term( id, book_id, section_id, name, description, criteria, criteria_desc, script, script_desc, priority, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{book.id}, #{section.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{criteria}, #{criteriaDesc}, #{script}, #{scriptDesc}, #{priority}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE diy_guide_term SET book_id = #{book.id}, section_id = #{section.id}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, criteria = #{criteria}, criteria_desc = #{criteriaDesc}, script = #{script}, script_desc = #{scriptDesc}, priority = #{priority}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
